ygData.subject: Re: Suggestions for high teen levels in unrest?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been in unrest since level 17.  Our group always seems to come back there for some reason. Although, we have had tons of close calls, I have found this
ygData.messageBody:
I have been in unrest since level 17. Our group
always seems to come back there for some reason.
Although, we have had tons of close calls, I have
found this my very very very favorite place for
gaining ooooooodles of experience. I think the main
thing is to have a very well balanced group. At level
17-19 we did mainly yard trash. Death beetles,
ghouls, greater skeletons. From 19-20, we did alot of
dark bones and dry bones. From 20 up (with a full
group of course) we tackled hags and the occasional
barbed boned skeleton (they hit like a semi and if you
pull more than one, you might think about making a run
for zone). Now, at nearly 28, there isnt much that we
cant take. Our group ranges from level 23 to 27 and
we can take on sizable trains.

As Anne Falbo-Ortiz (Topaaz) can tell you, she has had
many mis adventures in this zone. But, for me, it is
fun and I dont plan on leaving till level 29.

The main thing is, learn the ropes of the place. Try
to keep the same group and when looking for tanks,
advertise for one that is experienced in pulling.
Hopefully you'll get one.

To this day, we still stand along the back wall while
the younger groups look up at us with awe in their
eyes. (I got a big head, so sue me). They have become
familiar with our group and know that if they end up
in trouble they can ask us for help.

So far every one of my "gals" (characters) have gone
to unrest as soon as they earned the right of binding.

SOrry for ramblin =)

Adira Soulsaver
Bandaid of Tunare

(hehe, watch.... i'll go to unrest tonight and die 30
times just cuz of a swollen head)

--- "Sianne ." <maggee1@...> wrote:
> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
> I was at Unrest at lvl 23 with a full group
> including a 2nd cleric. The
> place was horrible. Death after death after death.
> Between deaths and
> running to the zone there were no points made. The
> only time we were there
> successfully was in a room (hand room) i think.
> Then shortly a high lvl
> cleric came in and ran us out....i am now almost lvl
> 27 and haven't been
> back yet. I may try to go back soon though...
>
>
> >From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ_CLERIC@..., EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Suggestions for high teen
> levels in unrest?
> >Date: Fri, 24 Sep 1999 07:52:25 EDT
> >
> >From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
> >
> >I have heard from many many people that unrest is a
> great place for a
> >cleric
> >to go starting around 14 or so. I am 17th (almost
> 18th) and am having
> >serious trouble there. Last night 6 people from my
> guild were there, all
> >15-20 and we had a rough time.
> >
> >We were at the back wall pulling from the back
> door. We had SoW and invis
> >to undead on the puller at all times, but there
> were many times where she
> >ended up bringing quite a few too many ghouls.
> (tried to pull 1 and
> >suddenly there were 7 of them on us!)
> >
> >Are we hunting at too high a level, or are we
> pulling from the wrong place?
> >Or do we just suck? We only had 2 deaths last
> night, but many many many
> >close calls. Lets just say thank god our druid was
> also saving 50% mana
> >for
> >heals.
> >
> >Meddik
> >Jaegergruppe
> >Bristlebane
> >
> >
